articles.title: Europe races to prepare for energy crunch this winter - Reuters
articles.description: European governments outlined new measures on Monday to cope with potential energy shortages this winter and raced to improve energy networks to share power, with Russian gas flows still running at severely reduced rates amid the Ukraine war.
articles.content: BERLIN/PARIS, Sept 19 (Reuters) - European governments outlined new measures on Monday to cope with potential energy shortages this winter and raced to improve energy networks to share power, with Ru… [+5467 chars]

articles.title: European Union moves to cut funding to Hungary for undermining democracy - Global News
articles.description: The EU says Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban has been undermining democracy as well as restricting the rights of migrants, gays and women during more than a decade in power.
articles.content: The European Union executive recommended on Sunday suspending some 7.5 billion euros in funding for Hungary over corruption, the first such case in the 27-nation bloc under a new sanction meant to be… [+2775 chars]
